intro: The International Institute of Theravada (IIT) is a monastic training institute dedicated to nurturing wise, disciplined, and compassionate monks rooted in the original teachings of the Buddha. Welcoming monks from all Theravada traditions and nationalities, IIT provides a structured environment that integrates deep scriptural study, rigorous Vinaya practice, meditation training, and modern pedagogical methods. Our aim is to empower bhikkhus committed to their own spiritual growth, capable of guiding others, upholding the monastic lineage, and spreading the Dhamma with clarity and integrity.
